channel.title: Real-Time Web on Lewwwk
channel.description: Recent content in Real-Time Web on Lewwwk

item.title: The real-time web. Game on!
item.description:
:::: entry-content Popularized by Twitter{.zem_slink rel=“homepage”}, the public micro-messaging medium is leading to a major evolution of the web and society.

Twitter is just the beginning of this real-time internet – the simplest manifestation of this long term trend – that spells the end of communications and start of an interaction society. ~ Om Malik{.zem_slink rel=“homepage”}, What Twitter and Broadband Mean to Me.

The public micro-message medium represents the potential for a 4 billion person global message board, where anyone can share their interests, ideas, and actions real-time, and where every message can be seen, referenced, and responded to by anyone directly, person to person. This is nothing short of monumental.
